      • isValidSize

        public static boolean isValidSize(int rows,
                                  int cols)
        Checks whether the given dimensions form a valid BoardSize. Both the number of rows and columns should be even and greater than zero.
        Parameters:
        rows - The number of rows of the Board.
        cols - The number of columns of the Board.
        Returns:
        True if the given dimensions form a valid BoardSize.
